page.title: 09Staxigoe Hall
page.content: In 1985 Staxigoe Hall was extended and improved to improve the amenities for the community. There are many functions held in the hall such as dances, discos, concerts, W.R.I., whist drive and committee meetings. The improved and extended hall is better than the old one as it now has proper insulation better heating and can be partitioned. We need a hall in our village as it brings the community together. Our hall is long and narrow with a lovely new wooden floor and wood lined walls. There is a stage which is not very high, and when it is stood on end it becomes a partition. There is also a store room, kitchen, toilet facilities and a committee room. The committee is responsible for the upkeep of the hall but anyone who has been using it has to clean it.
